title: AIFunnel Web
one_liner: High-conversion landing site for AI consulting and agentic engineering offers.
problem: The offer needed a stronger digital front door that could communicate positioning fast and convert profile visitors into qualified leads.
solution: Designed and shipped a production landing experience with focused messaging, strong above-the-fold framing, and direct CTA pathways.
impact: Created a high-clarity front door for AI consulting offers and improved how quickly prospects understand the value proposition.
highlights: Built a conversion-first one-page funnel with strong visual identity and clear action hierarchy.
Focused on performance and trust elements so visitors can understand the offer within seconds.
Used direct-response structure with service framing, proof signals, and friction-light CTA flow.
visibility_note: Core repository is private. This entry summarizes architecture and working approach without exposing proprietary source.
